revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #14 Pinap |image = [[File:Pinap.png]] |caption = It is said that when the sour skin is peeled, this spicy Berry can be crushed to make medicine. |growtime = 4m 0s |harvest = 13 berries |replant = 40% |points = 35 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Pinap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Sitrus]] and at least 1 [[Aspear]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 30 secs || 1 min || 3 mins || 4 mins - 8 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 4 mins -
8 mins |- ! Sprayduck | 2 mins 40 secs -
5 mins 20 secs |} == Flow Chart ==
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop || || Random
Drop |- | ↓ || || ↓ |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|20px]] [[Sitrus]] || + || [[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]] |- | colspan="3" | ↓ || |- | || [[File:Pinap.png|20px]] [[Pinap]] |}
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Pinap berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || || || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || || || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || |- | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || || || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Sitrus]] || - || - || - |- | [[Aspear]] || 2 mins until ripe || 1 min 20 secs || Not Practical |- |} {{Berries}}
